string.text: This is a ITEM test string
This is a another ITEM test string
A briefcase containing documents. Made from fireproof materials.

Something like a powerful electronic lock pick. It looks like it was created with a specific electronic lock in mind. Strangely enough the design isn't meant to be general - it was made for one lock and can't break any other codes.
Decoder
Psy-emission detector
PP-4a sensor
Plastic document file. It's hard to work anything out without a degree in biology.
Documents from lab X16
A thick pile of scientific documents. It's hard to work anything out without a degree in biology.

A worn manuscript in leather binding. Written by Sharpshooter himself. According to the headings it contains explanations of some of the Zone's secrets.
Documents from the secret stash in Pripyat
A heavy wooden crate with the word "Explosive" written on it in several languages
Dynamite crate
